subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2362
description_text:
I appreciate the upgrade for the inconvenience Sent from my iPhone On Aug 18, 2025, at 5:52 AM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hello, the Plus P3-H3 / Silver pedals you purchased are out of stock in our US warehouse. They will arrive on Thursday, and we will upgrade your order to Plus X. Thank you for your understanding. Alternatively, we can send you the black version now. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com
